title: [K-12] Simulation-Based Educational Program for Nursing Care Tracking in Peripheral Artery Disease Patients

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic nursing principles and foundational concepts of chronic disease management
context.additional_context: Patient care scenario learning in a VR environment replicating actual clinical situations

learning_goals: Identify pathological symptoms and risk factors of peripheral artery disease with ≥80% accuracy.
Develop and implement patient-specific follow-up care plans (medication management, wound observation) in VR simulation environments.

Use digital platforms (e.g., Padlet, Google Classroom) to design a patient-family-nurse role-assignment simulation project and submit a team project report meeting ≥4 of 5 collaboration checklist criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
